column4: Hello! I am using a touchscreen portable with an install of Ubuntu.  Input from the screen works fine as far as moving the pointer etc, but whenever I move the mouse it sends a nonstop stream of clicks to that coordinate - making using a virtual keyboard near impossible.  Any thoughts?
no joke! its driving me nuts
oops - yes, its a stream of clicks from the touchscreen
did you try(test) an other mouse device?
but what mouse does give the problem?
